attributes.action: legislate making it illegal for local councils to change weekly collection of non-recyclable waste to fortnightly without a local referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As our climate changes and gets warmer, waste left uncollected for two weeks at a time is a health hazard. It becomes a magnet for vermin, and a breading ground for maggots/flies plus the horrendous smells that go with uncollected waste. Councils use the fortnightly collection as a cost cutting exercise without regard to the health of the public that elected them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
